item.description:
Our March meeting included 18 attendees and the discussion was long and informative. Again I didn't get to talk about Diet and Supplementation so in April I will begin with that information. Sharing to follow if time allows.

Handouts were passed on to all attendees for info on the next meeting. Read over them in advance if possible and we'll be ready to dive into the diet and supplementation talk.

See you in April.

Betsy
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the one with the briefcase and all the papers in front of me.
item.why: You'll love it because everyone here, while in pain and suffering, is dedicated to getting well and are proactive in that endeavor.
item.name: The Reading Fibromyalgia April Meeting
